docs.text: Creating a build ¶ The server software must be built before it can be run. Windows Using command prompt , git bash , or powershell , run: ./publish.cmd <release | debug> <os> OSX/Linux Using terminal , run: ./publish.sh <release | debug> <os> os ( Optional ) The operating system to build the server against. If not specified then the server will be built for the same operating system. win osx ubuntu.16.04 , ubuntu.18.04 ubuntu.20.04 debian.9 , debian.10 centos.7 , centos.8

docs.text: Installation ¶ Windows Prerequisites ¶ Download and install the latest .NET 5 SDK Download and install from here Tip Use Git Bash as your command prompt. This can be found in the Windows Start Menu after installation. Install ModernUO ¶ Navigate to the folder where you want to install ModernUO. Using Git Bash run: git clone https://github.com/modernuo/modernuo cd modernuo OSX Prerequisites 1. Download and install the latest .NET 5 SDK 1. Using terminal , install homebrew and git: /bin/bash -c " $( curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install.sh ) " brew install git Install ModernUO 1. Using terminal , navigate to the folder where you want to install ModernUO and run: git clone https://github.com/modernuo/modernuo cd modernuo Linux Prerequisites 1. Download and install the latest .NET Core SDK 1. Using bash , install git: sudo apt update && sudo apt install git !!! Note The command to install git might be different for your flavor of linux. Consult your local Google search for answers. Install ModernUO 1. Using bash , navigate to the folder where you want to install ModernUO and run: git clone https://github.com/modernuo/modernuo cd modernuo

docs.text: Quick Start ¶ If you are familiar with RunUO, then follow these steps to get your ModernUO server running in less than 10 minutes: Windows Download and install the .NET 5 Runtime Download and extract ModernUO to a folder. Navigate to the Distribution folder. Run ModernUO.exe OSX Download and install the .NET 5 Runtime Download and extract ModernUO to a folder. Using terminal , navigate to the Distribution folder. Run dotnet ModernUO.dll Linux Download and install the .NET 5 Runtime Download and extract ModernUO to a folder. Using bash , navigate to the Distribution folder. Run dotnet ModernUO.dll Note Follow the rest of the Get Started guide to learn how to connect, configure, and customize, your server.
